book.title: コイバナ!恋せよ花火 3 (Koibana! Koiseyo Hanabi #3)
book.description: 誓への想いを確信した花火。でも誓には雪音がいる…なんて悩んでると、花火・誓・美衣・尾山でWデート(?)に行く事に!! 様子のおかしい美衣も含めて、皆の恋心がふくらんでいきます!!

book.title: コイバナ!恋せよ花火 2 (Koibana! Koiseyo Hanabi #2)
book.description: 花火に何かとちょっかいを出してくる誓。と思ったら突然そっけなくなり…コロコロ変わる誓の態度に花火の心の中はもやもやしっぱなし。オトコなんていらないって思ってたけど…?

book.title: Rebel Souls (W.I.T.C.H., #36)
book.description: While astral Irma and Hay attempt to free Corny and Taranee, Will astral is on a mission to destroy the real Will’s life! Too late to fix the damage their five astral drops have caused, the guardians bring their five rebellious copies to Kandrakar. In two surprise decisions, the Oracle grants the astral drops the right to choose, and the girls unanimously decides to set them free. The astral drops finally get the chance to lead new lives!

book.title: The Scent of Freedom (W.I.T.C.H., #34)
book.description: After a successful mission, the guardians go back to their “regular” lives without realizing that something has changed within their astral drops—they now have their own thoughts and feelings! When the Vandoms leave town to assist a family friend, Will’s double takes her place and urges the four other drops to leave town for good.

book.title: Mirrored Lives (W.I.T.C.H., #35)
book.description: Escaping Heatherfield to start new lifes away from their real selfs, the astral drops find themselves in a scary new city with no place to live in and hardly any money! While these girls are busy finding ways to earn cash in Midgale, little do they know that Orube is on a mission to hunt them down.

book.title: The Greatest Gift (W.I.T.C.H., #33)
book.description: The guardians face the wrath of Ari when they make another attempt to free the banshee. The girls cleverly defeat him and the banshee escapes—but she takes Maqi with her! The girls and Ari search for Maqi and battle with a throng of banshees. A bad fall endangers the life of Maqi, but the guardians’ gift of regeneration brings him back to life! Meanwhile In Heatherfield, the Guardians’ astral drops create their own uproar when they start to feel resentful of their masters and decide that it’s payback time.

book.title: Behind the Mask (W.I.T.C.H., #32)
book.description: Cornelia, Taranee, and Hay Lin are reuniting with Will, Irma, and Orube. This gives the girls a chance to focus all their strength on other pressing matters such as the meddlesome Ralph Sylla. While the girls are planning on how to deal with the investigator, a more formidable opponent rises to challenge, this one appears to be fully human with supernatural powers, and the agents captures Will!

book.title: The Voice of Silence (W.I.T.C.H., #31)
book.description: Taranee puts her objection on hold and resumes her post as a guardian of Kandrakar. Fighting side by side with Orube, the six girls regroup in Heatherfield (putting their Sylla problem temporarily on hold) to try and free the banshee. In Arkhanta, they come across another being yearning to break free—Maqi!

book.title: The Chamber of Tempests (W.I.T.C.H., #30)
book.description: Orube learns the meaning of defeat being possessed by Yua, but before any harm can be done to the Oracle, the guardians banish the banshee's evil spirit. Back in Redstone, Taranee discovers Agent Raphael Sylla's real identity. Sylla strikes back and forces Taranee to unleash her tremendously strong abilities so he can expose her and her best friends to the world as superhuman beings.

book.title: The Lesser Evil (W.I.T.C.H., #29)
book.description: Orube, the best pupil of Luba, temporarily fills the spot of Taranee as guardian of Kandrakar. While confronting personal issues, the new group travels to Akhanta for another mission. At Urdath, the girls get blown away by a violent cyclone created by Yua!

book.title: So Close, Yet So Far (W.I.T.C.H. #28)
book.description: The Oracle asks Orube to take over Taranee’s place as a guardian of Kandrakar. In between adjusting to Redstone (Cornelia, Hay Lin, and Taranee) and staying in rainy Heatherfield (Will and Irma), the new team of guardians joins forces to confront Ari of Arkhanta—the newest threat to Kandrakar.

book.title: Water Shadows (W.I.T.C.H., #25)
book.description: Irma meets a peculiar old man named Jewell at her father's office who appears to know everything about Irma and her and her friends' status as Guardians of the Veil. He also tells her that he knows a way to help them, but when he is kidnapped, the W.I.T.C.H. girls must come to his rescue.

book.title: Trust Me (W.I.T.C.H. #24)
book.description: Rocky roads are in sight for two Guardians. Taranee’s rebellious streak is unleashed after her mother embarrasses her in front of her friends. and Will’s life is turned upside down after Matt’s friend (Mandy) and her father come to Heatherfield.

book.title: Goodbye! (W.I.T.C.H., #23)
book.description: Cornelia says farewell to Caleb as he decides to return to his home with Professor Rudolph..and the four guardians make a side trip to Meridian, but after they return to Heatherfield, Will discovers that her astral drop has gone missing!

book.title: Shadows Of Tomorrow (W.I.T.C.H., #21)
book.description: The sinister Nerissa tries to enter the gates of Kandrakar! Without their powers, the girls are no match for her. But they won’t give up! With the help of Eric’s grandpa, they discover the Star of Cassidy and get their powers back.

book.title: A Gust Of Hate (W.I.T.C.H., #20)
book.description: The lives of the guardians return to normal--a world without Nerissa! In Heatherfield, strange linger in Will's mind, causing her to doubt her friends. At the school's farewel party for Mrs. Rudolph, Nerissa's wicked trick is uncovered... and she succeds in taking the Heart of Kandrakar from Will by disguising herself as Matt!

book.title: The Other Side Of The Story (W.I.T.C.H., #19)
book.title_without_series: The Other Side Of The Story
book.description: Looking for a way to defeat Nerissa, Will and Hay Lin set out to find two former guardians. But the truth they uncover threatens Will's position as the keeper of the Heart of Kandrakar and forces the W.I.T.C.H. girls into a battle with Nerissa in the Realm of Nightmares.

book.title: Nerissa's Seal (W.I.T.C.H., #16)
book.description: Will, Taranee, Cornelia and Hay Lin go on vacation with Irma and her family to the beach to have some fun in the sun. However, their fun doesn't last long because soon enough the W.I.T.C.H. girls are called away to Kandrakar where Yan Lin informs them about a previous guardian named Nerissa and tells them that she will be their new enemy. Meanwhile, at Mount Thanos, Nerissa uses her powers to transform a dog into her minion Khor and sends it off to do battle with the W.I.T.C.H. girls and capture Hay Lin.

book.title: Remnants of Summer (W.I.T.C.H., #18)
book.description: Hay Lin finds summer love, Luba's fate is questioned by the Council of Kandrakar and the W.I.T.C.H. girls come face to face with Nerissa for the first time.

book.title: Don't Close Your Eyes (W.I.T.C.H., #17)
book.description: Nerissa uses her powers to create three more minions: Shagon, Tridart and Ember and sends them out to destroy the W.I.T.C.H. girls, who are currently on separate vacations. Will continues having bad dreams and Luba tries to capture Caleb through Cornelia, but fails when Caleb is captured by Nerissa’s minions.

book.title: The Courage To Choose (W.I.T.C.H., #15)
book.description: Cornelia absorbs all of the powers of the W.I.T.C.H. girls and tries to use them to bring Caleb back to life, but is interrupted by Luba. After she succeeds in bringing Caleb back to life, she gives the other Guardians their powers back and Luba disappears without a trace.

book.title: I Know Who You Are (W.I.T.C.H., # 13)
book.description: Cornelia has been noticeably missing from school for two days. Curious about what has happened to her, Will, Irma, Taranee and Hay Lin visit her apartment and find out why: she is overwhelmingly upset about Caleb being transformed into a delicate flower. Meanwhile, Frost kidnaps Taranee's brother Peter and the other Guardians fight Frost in order to rescue him. After the battle has ended, they all get transported to Kandrakar where they meet up with Yan Lin, who informs them that by not giving Cornelia the comfort she needed, their friendship is strained and with that, their powers will diminish. If that wasn't enough to get the Guardians concerned, Will informs Irma, Taranee and Hay Lin that her mom has made a decision to move back to Fadden Hills.

book.title: The End Of A Dream (W.I.T.C.H., #14)
book.description: Luba creates an Altermere by combining the Aurameres that finds Cornelia after jumping out of Irma's window and merges itself with her, granting the power of all five elements. Cornelia then feels exceptionally powerful and has a feeling that she can transform Caleb, who is in a delicate flower state, back into his original human form. Meanwhile, Will, Irma, Taranee and Hay Lin go to great lengths to prevent Will from moving back to Fadden Hills.

book.title: The Challenge Of Phobos (W.I.T.C.H., # 12)
book.description: The W.I.T.C.H.es combat Cedric for the crown as the royal siblings fight for the throne. Elyon rises victorious and takes her place as the rightful queen of Meridian. Triumphant, the girls get to visit Kandrakar.

book.title: The Crown Of Light (W.I.T.C.H., #11)
book.description: Will, Irma, Taranee, Cornelia, and Hay Lin try to protect their friends living in both sides of the Veil. Martin stumbles on Uriah’s mean trick in school, while Phobos deceives Elyon into accepting the Crown of Light. War breaks out in Meridian.

book.title: A Bridge Between Two Worlds (W.I.T.C.H., #10)
book.description: In Heatherfield, agents are investigating Elyon's disappearance, and the Guardians fear that their identities will be revealed. An urgent cry for help from Elyon sends the Guardians of the Veil back across the Veil to Meridian. There, they find the young girl struggling to bridge the gap between her past life and her new role in Meridian. Elyon has made a startling discovery about her parents that could ruin her chances of happiness in her new world. How can Elyon bridge the gap between her old life and her royal future?

book.title: The Four Dragons (W.I.T.C.H., #9)
book.description: With the help of a Christmas play and a lost Meridian boy, Hay Lin and the gang discover the origin of their powers and realize that what they need to accomplish their mission is faith and courage.

book.title: The Black Roses Of Meridian (W.I.T.C.H., #8)
book.description: Everyone’s attending Karmilla’s concert, but family problems cause Will to miss it! A portal at the stadium forces Will to disobey her mom and become invisible.Will is accompanied by her dormouse on a solo mission to Meridian In the end, they fight Cedric in front of a live audience!

book.title: One Day You'll Meet Him (W.i.t.c.h, #7)
book.description: Cornelia secretly travels to Meridian to see Elyon and meets a Murmerer named Caleb. A magical blast creates a strong earthquake, leading the four remaining girls to Metamoor to help out their friends.Cornelia travels to Meridian

book.title: Illusions And Lies (W.I.T.C.H., #6)
book.description: Will is having trouble getting along with everyone! The other Guardians uncover the cause of Will’s problems, and they reunite just in time to close a portal and fight Elyon’s forces in Cedric’s bookshop.

book.title: So Be It Forever (W.I.T.C.H., #5)
book.description: A mysterious monster shows up in the Heatherfield Museum, triggering the W.I.T.C.H. girls and Uriah’s gang to sneak into the museum late at night. Inside, the girls encounter a beautiful, magical painting…and Elyon traps the the girls in a painting with no powers and there, they meet a painter and come face to face with Frost.

book.title: The Power Of Fire (W.I.T.C.H., #4)
book.description: Attempting to rescue Taranee from the evil clutches of Elyon, Will, Irma, Cornelia, and Hay Lin leave behind five imperfect astral drops in Heatherfield—not knowing the replicas would commit irreparable blunders!

book.title: The Dark Dimension (W.i.t.c.h., #3)
book.description: After a scary encounter with Professor Rudolph, the W.i.t.c.h.es realize that things are not always what they seem. During their first adventure in Meridian, the W.i.t.c.h. girls are attacked by Phobos and Elyon's minions and Taranee gets captured.

book.title: The Twelve Portals (W.i.t.c.h., #2)
book.description: The five gals try to learn more about their mission as Guardians of the Veil. While finding a friend and losing a loved one, they receive a magical map that reveals the 12 passageways in Heatherfield to Meridian! and the girls have to close them.

book.title: Halloween (W.I.T.C.H., #1)
book.description: Cinque ragazze scoprono di essere le predestinate di una missione millenaria: difendere l'equilibrio del mondo, diventando le guardiane della muraglia che separa la Terra dal Metamondo. Loro alleate le forze della natura grazie alle quali Will (poteri della quintessenza), Irma (poteri dell'acqua), Taranee (poteri del fuoco), Cornelia (poteri della terra) e Hay Lin (poteri dell'aria) possono trasformarsi in figure magiche: il tutto grazie al cuore di Kandrakar, ciondolo magico custodito da Will, donatele da Yan Lin, che funge da catalizzatore dei loro poteri.

book.title: あなたに花を捧げましょう 3 (Anata ni Hana o Sasagemashou #3)
book.title_without_series: あなたに花を捧げましょう 3
book.description:
彼の呪いを解けるか!?大人気ファンタジー
柚月のことが本当に好きだと気付いたセリは、紆余曲折を経て彼と結婚。
呪いの正体を調べた末に、二人は信州までその手がかかりとなる芳賀という人物の下を訪れる。
しかし芳賀家のトラブルに巻き込まれ、人違いから攫われたセリは、そこで思わぬ情報を掴み!?　
ファンタジック・ラブ、第3巻!!

book.title: anata ni hana o sasagemashou volume 2
book.title_without_series: anata ni hana o sasagemashou volume 2

book.title: あなたに花を捧げましょう 4 (Anata ni Hana o Sasagemashou #4)
book.title_without_series: あなたに花を捧げましょう 4
book.description:
呪われた花嫁…本格ラブミステリー完結!
代々、長子が短命という｢呪い｣を受けた古御堂家。次代当主・柚月と愛し合い結ばれたセリは、柚月を守るため、ご先祖様達の霊に助けられながら、｢呪い」の過去をさかのぼり真相を突き止めようとする。
呪いの力はナゼかセリに及ばず、｢運命の花嫁」だと言われる。しかしセリは同時に｢呪い｣の怒りに同調する感覚も覚え、呪いに取り込まれるのではないかという不安にさいなまれる。一方、セリを慕っていた同級生・守屋が呪いの力に毒され、古御堂家を攪乱しようし…!?
｢呪い｣の隠された真実を暴き、セリは柚月と添い遂げることが出来るのか…!?
